content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DisableAlertCondition path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/monitoring/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/monitors/{monitor_id}/alerts/conditions/{condition_id}/disable content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name monitorid
desc a monitor id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name conditionid
desc a monitoring alert condition id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum disable an alert condition
responses
title: 3_Alert Conditions_DisableAlertCondition_13.json
